Title: Homewrecker
Writer: Tom Kapinos (developed by), Mike Costa, Jenn Kao (executive story editor), Neil Gaiman (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on the characters created by: for Vertigo)
Actors: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, D.B. Woodside
Plot: Lucifer goes to great lengths to protect his home when the owner is murdered and the new owner wants it demolished.
